vocabinfos.mediumDef:
Also named: pentēkostē<\i> (πεντηκοστή "Pentecost" G4005)
§ This name is used for:
1) seven, period of seven (days or years), heptad, week
1a) period of seven days, a week
1a1) Feast of Weeks
1b) heptad, seven (of years)
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 七, 以七(日,年)為一週期, 成七的一組, 週
1a) 七天為一週期的時間, 一週
1b) 每七年一算, 七年
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
1) 七, 以七(日,年)为一周期, 成七的一组, 周
1a) 七天为一周期的时间, 一周
1b) 每七年一算, 七年

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
1) seven, period of seven (days or years), heptad, week
1a) period of seven days, a week
1a1) Feast of Weeks
1b) heptad, seven (of years)
Also means: sha.vu.a (שָׁבוּעַ "week" H7620I)
